outputs.output_descr: The goal of NCCSP is to contribute in ensuring that the poorest and most vulnerable communities in Nepal are able to adapt to the negative effects of CC. The key objective is enhance the capacity of Government particularly MOSTE and MOFALD and non-governmental institutions to implement the Nepal CC policy 2011. It mainly aims to execute the most urgent and immediate adaptation actions in order to increase the resilience of climate vulnerable and poor people of Nepal.
